name: Metal Rain
description:
Space, year unknown. Intense space battle.  One of the ships received several hits and the human aboard was badly injured and forced to make an emergency landing on the close planet. Afterward, this person went to a cryosleep to increase the chances of survival. Your task, computer, is to take care of the ship, fix it using the robots and get the hell outta here!

Authors: Ondrej Lomic, Maroš Betko, David Kuták
